data.text: @wizzair Watch out! #Wizzair make you pay EUR 40 at the airport for check-in even when you can't check in on-line and their website clearly says otherwise. You're meant to call their Call Center as if you should know that their website is incorrect. It's simply a #scam / rip-off!
@wizzair Thanks, I am looking every day 😁
@durano_vie Hi Duran, we're constantly updating our website, the winter schedule will be on sale soon, so stay tuned!

@wizzair Hi,
 
When you gonna share the winter flight plan? Especially Vienna - Tel Aviv. No flights available after 27 October..
@wizzair @wizzair refused to refund £300 to a Ukrainian single mother who didn’t want to fly to Kiev because of the war and foreign office advice. Profit before people safety is @wizzair’s mantra….

@SafarovaMonika Hi! We're constantly implementing changes in the affected flights by the Ukrainian situation, so please keep an eye on your mailbox for further information and your options. Thank you.
@wizzair Are you cancelling flights to/from Moldova?
